paper_abstract: Simulations help students to deal with complex real problems, therefore engineering instructors include these software packages in their teaching methodologies. To achieve a learning aim, different programs can be chosen. Which is the adequate choice? Based on educational criteria, we implement a well-known selection method, the analytic hierarchy process (AHP), to find a satisfactory solution. An example portrays the selection tool performance in the thermal engineering field. (c) 2011 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 22:200-208, 2014; View this article online at ; DOI
paper_title: An AHP application to select software for engineering education
